item.title: TryHackMe Baron Samedit
item.description: OverView Baron Samedit room Baron Samedit Task 01: Deploy Task 02: Baron Samedit In January 2021, Qualys released a blog post detailing a terrifying new vulnerability in the Unix sudo program. Specifically, this was a heap buffer overflow allowing any user to escalate privileges to root – no misconfigurations required.
